message.blockcarpentry.unlock: This block is now unlocked and players can open or close it!
message.blockcarpentry.redstone_off: This block now ignores redstone signals
message.blockcarpentry.redstone_on: This block no longer ignores redstone signals
message.blockcarpentry.block_not_availab: Ledsen, men detta block kan inte visas.
message.blockcarpentry.block_error: Ett fel uppstod med detta block, anmäl gärna detta till mod-kreatören, PianoManu.
message.blockcarpentry.converting_outdat: This block had an outdated tile entity, I've fixed that for you! :)
advancements.blockcarpentry.root.descrip: Högerklicka med valfritt block, och bevittna magi
advancements.blockcarpentry.illusion_blo: Ledtråd: Lägg in ett ramblock i en arbetsbänk. Simpelt.
advancements.blockcarpentry.gathering.de: Du har nu officiellt jävligt många ramblock. Varför?
advancements.blockcarpentry.stairs.title: Ett steg upp
advancements.blockcarpentry.stairs.descr: Vad finns en trappa upp? - Trappor pratar tyvärr inte...
advancements.blockcarpentry.slab.title: Platta skämt
advancements.blockcarpentry.slab.descrip: Två betongplattor går in i en bar...
advancements.blockcarpentry.door.title: Dörroman
advancements.blockcarpentry.door.descrip: Är du trött på skämt än?
advancements.blockcarpentry.button.title: Knappen föll av klippan!
advancements.blockcarpentry.button.descr: Varför det? För någon tryckte ner den!
advancements.blockcarpentry.trapdoor.des: Det heter fallucka för en anledning.
advancements.blockcarpentry.bed.title: En säng utav ramar
advancements.blockcarpentry.bed.descript: Vadå? Ska du rama in en säng?
advancements.blockcarpentry.fence.title: Sömnproblem
advancements.blockcarpentry.fence.descri: Otur att får inte kan hoppa över staket här...
advancements.blockcarpentry.gate.title: ...En grind.
advancements.blockcarpentry.gate.descrip: Börjar du ta mig seriöst än?
advancements.blockcarpentry.ladder.title: Steghjälp: Klättring
advancements.blockcarpentry.ladder.descr:
Steg 1: Steg 1
Steg 2: Steg 2
Steg 3: Steg 3
Steg 4: Steg 4
advancements.blockcarpentry.wall.title: Uppåt väggarna
advancements.blockcarpentry.pressure_pla: Det verkar som att trycket precis gick upp..
advancements.blockcarpentry.chest.title: Ont i kistan
advancements.blockcarpentry.chest.descri: Bara det inte är en begravningskista...
advancements.blockcarpentry.all.title: Ramfeber
tooltip.blockcarpentry.hammer: §6§oRight-click on a frame or illusion block to remove its content without destroying the block
tooltip.blockcarpentry.texture_wrench: §6§oRight-click on a frame block to cycle through all possible textures or Right-click on an illusion block to rotate the model
tooltip.blockcarpentry.chisel:
§6§oRight-click on a frame or illusion block to cycle through a list of available designs
§eHint: §6§oSome blocks do not have multiple designs (right now), so using the Chisel on them won't change anything
tooltip.blockcarpentry.paintbrush:
§6§oRight-click on a frame or illusion block to change the color of addons
§eHint: §6§oOnly a few blocks have designs with addons; the Paintbrush can only change the color of the addon, if the current design has one
tooltip.blockcarpentry.base_frame: §6§oPlace and right-click with a block of your choice, and the frame will take on the appearance of the block, having the same texture on every side
tooltip.blockcarpentry.base_illusion:
§6§oPlace and right-click with a block of your choice, and the illusion block will take on the whole model of the block
If you, for example, take a furnace, the illusion block will have the front, sides, top and bottom faces like a real furnace - hence the name "illusion block"
tooltip.blockcarpentry.vanilla_like: §6§oThe frame behaves like its vanilla counterpart, but it won't take over attributes of the mimicked block
tooltip.blockcarpentry.layered: §6§oThis block can be placed in all six directions and can be stacked similar to snow
tooltip.blockcarpentry.slope: §6§oThe slope and edged slope behave like normal vanilla stairs but with more stages per block
tooltip.blockcarpentry.locking:
§6§oRight-click this block with an iron ingot to lock its state (open or closed, players won't be able to open or close this block anymore), or with a piece of redstone dust to make it ignore redstone signals
Right-click again to undo
tooltip.blockcarpentry.rotatable: §6§oSneak when placing this block to create a vertical version
